tool_description: An API showing the latest climate change news around the global
name: Climate Change Live Report
title: Climate Change Live Report

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will back all news about climate change from all over world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-report.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-report.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-report.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-report.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
